days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist in the morning and at night. A few light rain patches. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist at first. Occasional showers. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy. Occasional showers. Possible thunderstorms. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
